channel.title: Editing Microsoft Publisher files(.pub) files?
channel.description:
[s]Hmm. I've been googling for the past hour and can't find any working solutions. I can't open a video with the mp4 encoding. I tried with Kaffeine (the default video player for Kubuntu), and it opens, it will open and begin playing, not showing any picture with the speed +3, so instead of it playing a second of the video a time, it plays 3 seconds of the video in one second.
But I can't hear anything or see anything. o.0 It works with all other video types :/ [/s]
Okay, I need to finish this Microsoft Publisher file for school, and I don't have windows on this drive as I made a mistake upon reformation etc, and OpenOffice doesn't have a program capable. I've googled and a lot of sources have said that it can't done..?

item.title: Editing Microsoft Publisher files(.pub) files?

[s]Hmm. I’ve been googling for the past hour and can’t find any working solutions. I can’t open a video with the mp4 encoding.
